snippet.title: TOmS - Fallout Equestria - Public Pre-Alpha Release Trailer
snippet.description:
After a long and arduous journey, we are very pleased to present our first public demo!

While we were slightly off in our projected release date, I think you’ll agree that the version you can download now marks a significant improvement from our limited-access release in September. Graphics, gameplay and content have all been much improved.

More info (and download!!!):
http://theovermare.com/wave-3-demo-better-late-than-never-edition

(The song is Step Around by the Wasteland Wailers, our in-house music team, sung by Brittany Church: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d741JHtavVs)

---

The Overmare Studios
http://theovermare.com/

SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/wasteland_wailers

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OvermareStudios

Twitter: https://twitter.com/OvermareStudios

DeviantArt: http://the-overmare-studios.deviantar...
